DOC.brief_summary: The purpose current randomize clinical trial determine effect myofascial soft tissue release kinesio tap disability , pain , quality life , autonomic nervous system oxidative stress indicator chronic low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Myofascial Release Kinesio Taping Autonomic Nervous System Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Randomized Clinical Trial . Objective : determine effect myofascial soft tissue release kinesio tap pain , disability , quality life , autonomic nervous system indicator . Methods Measures : sixty-four individual randomly assign one two group . Intervention : For 10-week , group 1 undergo treatment comprise myofascial soft tissue release protocol ( 1/week ) group 2 recieve kinesio tap treatment ( 1/week ) . Main Outcome Measures : Intensity pain , disability , quality life , biochemical stimation intertitial fluid , body mass indicator , hormonal indicator , indicator autonomic nevous system , indicator oxidative stress collect group baseline , 10 week 15 week last intervention . Baseline demographic clinical variable examine group independent Student t-test continuous data . Separate 2x3 model ANOVA time ( baseline , 10 week 15 week ) within-subjects factor , group determine effect treatment .
DOC.criteria: Score ≥ 4 Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire . Low Back Pain ≥ 3 month . Not undergo another physical therapy treatment . Disease central peripheral nervous system . Having previously undergone manual therapy . Contraindication low back manual therapy . A history spinal surgery . Treatment corticosteroid past two week . Clinical sign radiculopathy Presence Stenosis
